short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SummarAI is a Chrome extension that uses AI to instantly summarize highlighted text on any webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SummarAI is a powerful Chrome extension that leverages advanced AI technology to summarize any text you highlight on a webpage. Whether you're reading a long article, a complex scientific paper, or a lengthy blog post, SummarAI can help you understand the key points in seconds.

Features:

Easy to Use: Simply highlight the text you want to summarize, click the SummarAI icon, and get a concise summary instantly.
Customizable Summary Length: Choose from one sentence, 2-4 sentences, or a bulleted list to suit your needs.
Advanced Settings: Select from different AI models for different types of text.
Copy & Regenerate: Easily copy the summary to your clipboard or regenerate the summary if needed.
SummarAI is perfect for students, researchers, professionals, or anyone who wants to quickly understand the essence of a text. Save time and increase your productivity with SummarAI!

To Use:

Currently, users must have an openai API key. When installed users will be prompted for the key, after that simply pin the extension to your browser and start selecting!
